decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of the decision notice.   Reason: To comply with the provisions of S.51 of the Planning & Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the approved plans and documents, as set out below: Location Plan 28BR-01-001Block Plan 28BR-02-010Proposed Block Plan 28BR-02-010 RevAExisting Ground Floor Plan Existing First Plan 28BR-01-002Proposed Ground Floor Plan Proposed First Floor Plan 28BR-02-001Proposed Ground Floor Plan Proposed First Floor Plan 28BR-02-001 RevAExisting Roof Plan 28BR-01-003Proposed Roof Pan 28BR-02-002Proposed Roof Pan 28BR-02-002 RevAExisting Rear Elevation Existing Side Elevation 28BR-01-004Proposed Side Elevation 28BR-02-004Proposed Side Elevation 28BR-02-004 RevAProposed Rear Elevation 28BR-02-003Proposed Rear Elevation 28BR-02-003 RevAExisting Front Elevation Existing Section 28BR-01-005Proposed Front Elevation Proposed Section 28BR-02-005Proposed Ground Floor Plan SuDS Calculations 28BR-03-001Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

With exception of the timber cladding hereby approved, all new external work shall be carried out in materials that resemble, as closely as possible, in colour and texture as specified in the approved application.Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area.
